column5: Boy am I glad to hear this, as I'm moving out to Antigonish.
I had no idea they had browns out east!  Noicely done Rich.  Thanx.  HD
Great report and pics Rich!!!   ... but it looks like God put the eyeballs a little too close to the buttholes on most of those fish in N.S. eh?
Beauty report, glad ya's had a good time...
AWESOME report and pic's Rich....  Thanks for sharing your holidays...  Enjoyed the read too...
Very nice!  Those creek shots had me salivating...a fly rod would be oodles of fun there I bet! Nice brownies too, beauty colors on them. thanks for shareing
Super Report Rich.. how long till you get your own fishing show on TV
